name: The Malevolent
description:
The Malevolent is an unfinished game I developed back in 2017. It was created and submitted as a final project for one of my early game development classes and has never seen the light of day since. I recently re-discovered it on my hard drive and decided it should be available to play and experience. 

As stated above, it is unfinished. It is missing some audio as well as some extra features that were originally planned but cut due to time constraint. You may experience some bugs, but overall it is a running game that can be completed in about 10-15 minutes or less. 

This game was heavily inspired by the Resident Evil series. From the gameplay to the in game items, and even the sound cue when starting a new game, the influence is very obvious. 

The game controls like any other typical FPS:

Mouse - Aim

WASD - Move

Left Shift - Sprint

Left Click - Shoot

Tab - Aim Down Sights

R - Reload

P - Pickup

F - Flashlight On/Off

H - Heal

Space - Pause

1/2 - Switch Weapons

For more about myself, development updates, and game announcements follow me on Twitter. Also, be sure to check out my other games right here on Itch as well!
